mapper.delete: delete from ujcms_channel_ext where id_ in (select t.id_ from ujcms_channel t where t.site_id_ = #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update ujcms_channel_ext set seo_title_ = #{seoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seo_keywords_ = #{seoKeywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seo_description_ = #{seoDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, static_file_ = #{staticFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile_static_file_ = #{mobileStaticFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, editor_type_ = #{editorType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, text_ = #{text,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, markdown_ = #{markdown,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into ujcms_channel_ext (id_, seo_title_, seo_keywords_, seo_description_, static_file_, mobile_static_file_, editor_type_, text_, markdown_) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{seoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seoKeywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seoDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staticFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobileStaticFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{editorType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{text,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{markdown,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.sql: t.id_, t.seo_title_, t.seo_keywords_, t.seo_description_, t.static_file_, t.mobile_static_file_, t.editor_type_, t.text_, t.markdown_
